/*
 * findstr.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 27-Feb-2014
 *      Author: Anoosh
 */


#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main() {

	char str[100000];
	cin >> str;

	long int dummy = strlen(str);

	if(dummy < 3) {
		cout << "0" << endl;
	}
	else if(dummy == 3)
		cout << str;
	else {

		dummy = dummy/2;
		cout << str[dummy - 1] << str[dummy] << str[dummy + 1] << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
